t=input()
for ti in range(t):
    hn=map(int,raw_input().split())
    h=hn[0]
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    b=sorted(a)
    boolean=True
    for i in range(len(b)):
        if (i!=0 and b[i]-b[i-1]>h) or (i==0 and b[i]>h):
            print "No"
            boolean=False
            break
    if boolean==True:
        print "Yes"
